title: The Antidote To Infatuation: 4 Ways A Whirlwind Crush Takes Over Your Life
description: Infatuation can lead to disappointment when reality fails to match the perfect image we have created in our minds.

title: Is ‘Long Vax Syndrome’ A Rare Covid-19 Vaccine Side Effect? Here’s What’s Known
description: While the risk of postural orthostatic tachycardia syndrome (POTS) appears to be much higher after a severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) infection, there have been reports of people getting POTS after vaccination against Covid-19.

title: Report Alleges Narcan Revived Madonna, But Drug’s Use Raises Questions
description: Because Narcan isn't typically used in instances of septic shock, the public is left with more questions than answers regarding its alleged use in Madonna’s case.

title: New MacBook Pro Leak Uncovers Apple’s Disappointing Upgrade
description: Apple's next MacBook Pro will miss out a key improvement.

title: The EV Future Can Benefit From Supporting Tesla Superchargers

title: Jessica Simpson Denies Rumors That Ozempic Was Responsible For Her Weight Loss
description: When asked whether Ozempic was responsible for her weight loss, Simpson said, “Oh Lord. I mean, it is not.” She added, “It’s willpower."

title: How Many Xbox Game Pass Subscriptions Will ‘Starfield’ Generate? Will They Last?
description: While these appear to be mostly guesses, there is an idea that Starfield will generate somewhere between 3-5 million Game Pass subs by itself. 5 million subs would be 20% of all Xbox Game Pass subs to date, as the last reported figure was 25 million in January of 2022.

title: With ‘The Flash,’ DC Now Has 6 Of The 10 Biggest Comic Book Movie Bombs Ever
description: With ‘The Flash," DC Now Has 6 Of The 10 Biggest Comic Book Movie Bombs Ever I honestly cannot believe how big of a bomb The Flash has turned out to be.

title: BetBoom Qualifies For ‘Dota 2’ TI12 Tournament Despite Disqualification
description: Despite having a player disqualified from the Bali Major, BetBoom has secured qualification to The International 12 as Quest Esports failed to reach the final.

title: Lab-Grown Cotton Enters The Market With Galy-Suzuran Partnership
description: Suzuran says it plans to use 3,000 tons a year of Galy’s "Literally Cotton" fibers as part of a 10-year, $50 million partnership.

title: Samsung Targets Apple iPhone Owners With Silly Flip 5 Promotion
description: Samsung is ramping up its Galaxy Z fold 5 and Flip 5 marketing with a new promotion that targets Apple iPhone owners with a silly ad.

title: Commendations And Ranks, Destiny 2’s Two New Social Systems, Are Not Working
description: Destiny 2 always adds some decently big new features with each expansion, but a season and a half after Lightfall, I think it’s time to admit that its two biggest social system additions, commendations and ranks, are just not working

title: ‘The Witcher’ Has A Doctor Who-Like Lore Plan To Change Cavill To Hemsworth
description: It appears that the plan for the Cavill-Hemsworth switch is not just to swap them out, but to actually write the change into the story.

title: Here’s The Highest ‘Diablo 4’ Damage Class And Build Pre-Season 1 Launch
description: While occasionally things spiral out of control in Diablo 4, like a damage glitch that was briefly letting Barbarians do anywhere from 25 to 300 billion damage before it was patched, there are still ways to crank up your numbers probably tenfold from what you’re doing now, even in the endgame.

title: Is This The Coolest Electric Vehicle Ever?

description: BMW Motorrad insists it’s neither an e-scooter nor an e-motorbike, but more of a "e-parkourer" city machine weighing 132kg.
